name: Galactic Brigade M-3
description:
Galactic Brigade is a 3rd person shooter space battle game in which the player commandeers a space ship. The player must survive by shooting and destroying enemy ships to continue their journey through space. 

There is a main screen to start or quit the game, a first level that acts as a starter level,  and a second level. Enemy ship AI now works as intended. 

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move the ship around

Enter key - Accelerate

Space bar - Shoot

Press ESC during game play to quit.
